tasks.label: docker-down
tasks.command: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.proxy.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml -p mnestix-browser down -v

tasks.label: docker-down-rbac
tasks.command: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.proxy.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dynamic-rbac.yml -p mnestix-browser down
